overview: Chandni Chowk is a 1954 classic Muslim social drama film directed by B. R. Chopra.Produced by Prince Hira Sinh of Baria and Goverdhandas Aggarwal under the banner of Hira Films.The film starred Meena Kumari,Shekhar, Kumar, Jeevan, Smriti Biswas and Achala Sachdev.The story involves a Nawab belonging to the Chandni Chowk area of Delhi in the early 1920s, who gets "tricked into marrying his daughter to the gardener's son.
title: Chandni Chowk
